name: Atenciones por año y tipo
query:
SELECT 
    CONCAT(m.año, ' - ', m.tipo) AS año_tipo,
    m.cantidad_atenciones
FROM (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE CAST(YEAR(a.egreso) AS CHAR)
        END AS año,
        a.tipo,
        COUNT(*) AS cantidad_atenciones
    FROM 
        tabAtencion AS a
    INNER JOIN tabAnimal AS an ON a.parent = an.name
    GROUP BY 
        CASE 
            WHEN a.egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE CAST(YEAR(a.egreso) AS CHAR)
        END,
        a.tipo
) AS m
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE CAST(YEAR(egreso) AS CHAR)
        END AS año,
        COUNT(*) AS total_atenciones
    FROM tabAtencion
    GROUP BY 
        CASE 
            WHEN egreso IS NULL THEN 'En proceso'
            ELSE CAST(YEAR(egreso) AS CHAR)
        END
) AS t ON m.año = t.año
ORDER BY 
    (m.año = 'En proceso') ASC,
    m.año,
    m.tipo;
